A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I loved Rouge One and liked Force Awakens but TLJ was horrible\, not just as a SW movie but an actual film\, its bad.

This was as bad or actually worst than the prequels\, I never walked out of a Starwars movie this angry and depressed at the same time.

Hell at first I wasn't keen on a Solo\, Fett\, Jabba movies but at this point any Starwars movies away from the Rey trilogy is a dream come true... bring it on. You can keep the new Rian Johnson trilogy as well. I like Looper\, but I don't think I will be watching any of his future films.
